playlist

Class Playlist

  • Object
    • Playlist
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XMLSerialisable

    public class Playlist
extends Object
implements XMLSerialisable
    A playlist determines which tracks form a chart, which position each is in, and accompanying text and GFX to display Playlist is serialisable to and from disk - see XMLReader XMLWriter
    Author:
    tony

      The name of the theme associated with the playlist

        public boolean validatePlaylist(Playlist playlist)
        Will validate the items in a playlist for if file exists or if they will load. For use by other classes
        Parameters:
        playlist - a playlist
        Returns:
        boolean indicating that at least one file was not found
